title: @Riot please help me, i disenchanted my death sword ward skin
body:
i Just unlocked it no more than 10 mins before writing this post when i went to my loot and thought i was unlocking it permanently only to discover i disenchanted it. {{item:3070}} 
please can you guys help me {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

replies.body: Went to fix this, but it looks like someone already got this reversed for you from a ticket maybe? Never hurts to post here as well to cover your bases I guess ^_^
